title: Spaghetti Aglio, Olio, e Peperoncino
directions: Cook spaghetti according to the directions on the package, until it is al dente.
Strain spaghetti and place in a large serving dish.
Add minced garlic, chili pepper flakes, olive oil, salt, and pepper, and mix together well.
Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: 2 large or 3 small garlic cloves, minced
1/4 to 1/3 cup of extra-virgin olive oil
